    • doCreateIdentity

      protected String doCreateIdentity(String identityName, String description, String tenantId, String region, Optional<TrustConfiguration> trustConfig, Optional<CreateOptions> options)
      Create IAM Role with optional Trust Configuration and Create Options.
      Specified by:
      doCreateIdentity in class AbstractIam
      Parameters:
      identityName - the IAM role name (e.g., "MyApplicationRole").
      description - optional description for the role.
      tenantId - the AWS Account ID.
      region - the AWS region for the IAM client.
      trustConfig - optional trust configuration.
      options - optional creation options for the role.
      Returns:
      the IAM role ARN.

    • doAttachInlinePolicy

      protected void doAttachInlinePolicy(PolicyDocument policyDocument, String tenantId, String region, String resource)
      Description copied from class: AbstractIam
      Attaches an inline policy to a resource. Provider-specific implementations should override this method.
      Specified by:
      doAttachInlinePolicy in class AbstractIam
      Parameters:
      policyDocument - the policy document in substrate-neutral format
      tenantId - the tenant ID
      region - the region
      resource - the resource to attach the policy to

    • doGetInlinePolicyDetails

      protected String doGetInlinePolicyDetails(String identityName, String policyName, String roleName, String tenantId, String region)
      Get inline policy document attached to an IAM role.
      Specified by:
      doGetInlinePolicyDetails in class AbstractIam
      Parameters:
      identityName - the IAM role name
      policyName - the policy name
      roleName - the role name (not used in AWS)
      tenantId - the AWS Account ID (not used in AWS)
      region - the AWS region (not used in AWS)
      Returns:
      the inline policy document as a JSON string

    • doGetAttachedPolicies

      Specified by:
      doGetAttachedPolicies in class AbstractIam
      Parameters:

      tenantId - the AWS Account ID (not used in AWS)
      region - the AWS region (not used in AWS)
      Returns:
